name: Yin-Ham Versus the Dragoncat
description:
The brave hamster Yin-Ham has his pouch of coins, powerful coins in such tiny tiny hands, with a huge mission, to defeat the mighty and malicious Meowcifer; the Dragoncat. This is the premise and prototype of this demo of a deckbuilding game. Use your coins each turn to trigger abilities, and defeat Meowcifer. This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2022. It represents a barebones concept of a more fully envisioned deckbuilding game, where players gather coins and abilities to battle increasingly more powerful foes.

See screenshot for a few clarifications.
